The move reflects Nadella's concerns about Microsoft's survival in the AI era, as he warned employees that some of the company's biggest businesses may become irrelevant without fundamental changes.

title: Bryce Dunlap’s sudden death leaves fans with unanswered questions and grief
description: Bryce Dunlap, a 21-year-old Cleveland Browns fan, died from an anoxic brain injury following a sudden respiratory and cardiac emergency. His family honored his wish to donate organs, leading to a successful liver transplant for former Browns quarterback Bernie Kosar. The community has rallied in support, exceeding fundraising goals for his memorial.

title: Video sparks allegations of Trevon Diggs’ role in violent elevator encounter
description: Surveillance footage has surfaced regarding an elevator altercation in Los Angeles, allegedly involving individuals connected to the Diggs family. While Trevon Diggs isn't officially charged, a civil suit names him, and his brother Darez has faced legal action. The victim claims robbery and assault, sparking intense scrutiny.

title: LiAngelo Ball goes platinum with breakout hit 'Tweaker' featuring Drake
description: LiAngelo Ball, formerly a basketball player, has achieved a major milestone in music. His debut single 'Tweaker' has gone platinum. This success signifies a significant crossover from sports to the entertainment industry. The song became a cultural phenomenon, embraced by sports teams and charting highly. Ball's journey redefines his public identity and highlights his artistic ambition.

title: Tech firm whose founder beat Musk as world's richest for a day loses 30% market value
description: Larry Ellison briefly surpassed Elon Musk in wealth after a surge in Oracle's stock, driven by a massive OpenAI cloud deal. However, Oracle's value has since plummeted, erasing those gains and leaving Musk firmly back in the top spot. Investors are now cautious about Oracle's AI-dependent strategy and high valuations.
